scripts.start: rm -rf production && mkdir -p production && npm run build-client && npm run build-server && node production/server.js
scripts.build-client: cd client && npm i && npm run build && cp -r build ../production
scripts.build-server: cd server && npm i && gulp server && cp -r package.json dist && cd dist && npm i && cp -r * ../../production
scripts.dev: npm run client & npm run server
